faqs.question: Are my photos safe?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Your photos never leave your device. Everything runs offline. We can't see your photos â€” and we don't want to.

faqs.question: What are AI Albums?
faqs.answer: Your photos automatically sorted into smart categories: People, Couples, Pets, and Scenes (beach, city, food, travel). Find any photo without scrolling forever.

faqs.question: If I delete a photo, is it gone forever?
faqs.answer: No. Deleted photos are moved to the "Recently Deleted" album in your system Photos app. They will be kept there for 30 days before being permanently removed by iOS. You can recover them anytime within that period.

faqs.question: How much does SwipeClean cost?
faqs.answer: We offer a 3-day free trial with full access to all features. After the trial, it is $9.99/week (auto-renewable). We'll remind you before your trial ends â€” no surprise charges. Cancel anytime in Settings â†’ Subscriptions.

faqs.question: What's included in the free trial?
faqs.answer: Full access to all features for 3 days: duplicate detection, similar photos cleanup, AI albums, and all cleanup tools. No limitations.

faqs.question: How do I restore my purchase?
faqs.answer: Go to SwipeClean Settings > Premium, and tap "Restore Purchase".
